message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem involving bandit algorithms and stochastic optimization, which are typically studied in the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). The problem also involves optimization and decision-making, which are relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of partitions and probabilistic methods suggests a connection to data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also involves information theory and communication systems (cs.IT) as well as control systems and robotics (cs.SY) due to the nature of the problem.
